info.name: Surcharge_PartB_PartD_Sequencing_FP_R1.4
info.description:
This collection will executes the set of two following API folders:
a) IndividualTotalExpensesR3 primary & spouse folder contains 4 requests:
   1. IndividualTotalExpensesR3 primary -(User can change the primary input fields in this request, global varibles are set & test scripts available).
   2. Expenses Present Value of Surcharge at Retirement for primary.
   3. Expenses Present Value of Surcharge at Retirement for spouse.
b) FamilyTotalExpensesR3 Primary  & spouse folder contains 4 requests:
   1. FamilyTotalExpensesR3 primary.
   2. Expenses Present Value of Surcharge at Retirement for primary.
   3. Expenses Present Value of Surcharge at Retirement for spouse- (All the global variables are released)

exec: var response = JSON.parse(responseBody);  // storing the Json response in "response" variable
var pv_expenses0 = "["; //setting Arrays for PV Surcharge for Primary
var pv_expenses1 = "["; //setting Arrays for PV Surcharge for spouse
//finding length from individual total exp. from response body.
fromYear = response.individualTotalExpenses[0].year; //getting the first year value from the individualTotalExpenses array from the response body.
//getting the last year value from the individualTotalExpenses array from the response body.
//printing from year and to year in the console.

for (var i = 0; i < length1; i++) //for loop executes a set of statement until the given condition is true, once the condition is false it will come out of the for loop. It starts with value 0 executes the statement by increments 1(ie., i++) until it is less than the value of length1.
var year = response.individualTotalExpenses[i].year;  //getting year from the response body and storing in the year based on the i value.

.partBPremiumSurcharge + response.individualTotalExpenses[i].partDPremiumSurcharge;   //getting values and adding partBPremiumSurcharge and partDPremiumSurcharge from the response body and storing in the Surcharge based on the i value.
//concatenating the year and Surcharge expense and storing in the year_expense
var year_expense1 = '{"year": ' + year + ' , "expense": ' + Surcharge + "}"; //concatenating the year and Surcharge expense and storing in the year_expense
if (i < (length1 - 1)) // if this condition is true then it will execute the below statment.
year_expense += ','; //year_expense = year_expense + ',' after concatenating year and expense field assigning ","
year_expense1 += ','; //year_expense = year_expense + ',' after concatenating year and expense field assigning ","
pv_expenses0 += year_expense; //variable pv_expenses0 = pv_expenses0 + year_expense is stored
pv_expenses1 += year_expense1; //variable pv_expenses1 = pv_expenses1 + year_expense is stored
pv_expenses0 += ']';  // closing with "]" after the above statment.
pm.globals.set("expenses0", pv_expenses0); // assigning all the pv_expenses0 values to the global variable expenses0 for PV expenses
//Setting the global variables in the Pre-request, below input field values are for primary IndividualTotalExpensesR3 & primary familyTotalExpensesR3:

pm.globals.set("primarySingleVsMultipleMagi", 'true'); //If this field is true the request will consider the values in the "yearWiseMagiDetailList" field. If the field is false the request will consider the values in the "magiTier" field.

pm.globals.set("primaryMagiTierVsDollarAmount", 'true'); //If this field is true the request will consider the values in the "magiDollarAmount" field. If the field is false it will consider the "magiTier" field values.
//This input fields are for spouse FamilyTotalExpR3:
var Year = new Date(); //declaring a variable for year assigning a new Date
var CurrentYear = Year.getFullYear(); //fetching a current year
pm.globals.set("pvAsOnYear1", CurrentYear); //assigning the CurrentYear values to the global variable pvAsOnYear1

request.description: All the fields to be assigned before running the collection from the pre-requisite in the individualTotalExpensesR3 primary API, calculating Present Value of Surcharge At Retirement from individualTotalExpensesR3 API. They are global variables to be set in pre-request script.
